channel.title: Atlas - a small business theme and landing page crafted with Astro and Tailwind CSS
channel.description: Create an amazing website for your small business clients with our beautiful website theme designed using Astro and Tailwind CSS. Perfect for freelancers, developers, startups, and personal use.
